quotes.quote: Don't pick a job with a great vacation time. Pick one that doesn't need escaping from.
There is no future in any job. The future lies in the person who holds the job.
Find a job you enjoy doing, and you will never have to work a day in your life.
People may take a job for more money, but they often leave it for more recognition.
It is easier to do a job right than to explain why you didn't.
Do the hard jobs first. The easy jobs will take care of themselves.
Do your job and demand your compensation but in that order.
If you have a job without any aggravations, you don't have a job.
You'll be happy if you are doing a job you love.
If you say your job is something you "don't plan on doing forever," then why are you doing it now?
A lot of people quit looking for work as soon as they find a job.
While you wait for your dream job, you can engage yourself with the available job.
Do the job for the joy of work.
A job should only be a means of attaining the highest goal.
He who loves his job, will own it.
Every job is good if you do your best and work hard. A man who works hard stinks only to the ones that have nothing to do but smell.
A job is a safe place to hide from work.
There are no menial jobs, only menial attitudes.
The best job goes to the person who can get it done without passing the buck or coming back with excuses.
The best way to appreciate your job is to imagine yourself without one.
You will find a job, if you are willing to work.
A job isn't just a job. It's who you are.
Big jobs usually go to the men who prove their ability to outgrow small ones.
The big jobs are for the ones who can handle the small ones.
Pleasure in the job puts perfection in the work.
If a job is worth doing, it's worth doing well.
Many men beg for a job but have no clue what hard work really means.
The only job where you start at the top, is digging a hole.
Joy in your Job is possible to the extent you're willing to choose it.
The difference between a job and a career is the difference between forty and sixty hours a week.
The problem with having a job is that it gets in the way of getting rich.
When you are asked if you can do a job, tell 'em, 'Certainly I can!' Then get busy and find out how to do it.
When you have a permanent job, remember that the job is permanent not you.
If you think you're too big for small jobs, maybe you're too small for big job.
If you do the right job then money will come to you. Because people who need you will request, will ask for you, will attract you, and will be willing to pay you for your services.
Find a job you like and you add five days to every week.
Every job is a self-portrait of the person who does it. Autograph your work with excellence.
Work harder on yourself than you do on your job.
The most important question to ask yourself on the job is not, what am I getting? but what am I becoming?

Don't be afraid to give your best to what seemingly are small jobs. Every time you conquer one it makes you that much stronger. If you do the little jobs well, the big ones will tend to take care of themselves.
Work hard at your job and you can make a living. Work hard on yourself and you can make a fortune.
I choose a lazy person to do a hard job. Because a lazy person will find an easy way to do it.

The biggest mistake that you can make is to believe that you are working for somebody else. Job security is gone. The driving force of a career must come from the individual. Remember: Jobs are owned by the company, you own your career!
Nothing is particularly hard if you divide it into small jobs.
The hardest job kids face today is learning good manners without seeing any.
For many people a job is more than an income. It's an important part of who we are.
Transferring your passion to your job is far easier than finding a job that happens to match your passion.
If you have a job without aggravations, you don't have a job.
Life is supposed to be fun. It's not a job or occupation. We're here only once and we should have a bit of a laugh.

Never continue in a job you don't enjoy. If you're happy in what you're doing, you'll like yourself, you'll have inner peace. And if you have that, along with physical health, you will have had more success than you could possibly have imagined.
Why compare yourself with others? No one in the entire world can do a better job of being you than you.
A recession is when your neighbor loses his job. A depression is when you lose yours.
See the job, do the job, stay out of the misery.
My job is not to be easy on people. My job is to take these great people we have and to push them and make them even better.
It's just a job. Grass grows, birds fly, waves pound the sand. I beat people up.
I'm working full time on my job and part time on my fortune.
Always take a job that is too big for you.
True courage is being afraid, and going ahead and doing your job anyhow, that's what courage is.
It is not enough to be a hardworking person. Equally important is the job you are working at.
They call upon us to supply American boys to do the job that Asian boys should do.
Let's take care of the necessities first, give people jobs, and find a way to get us out of poverty.
Ayn Rand more than anyone else did a fantastic job of explaining the morality of capitalism, the morality of individualism.
Peacekeeping is not a job for soldiers, but only soldiers can do it.
It's not what you achieve, it's what you overcome. That's what defines your career.
Only undertake what you can do in an excellent fashion. There are no prizes for average performance.
Starting a new job is always scary, or at least for me it's always scary. It's like the first day of school.
Criticism of others is futile and if you indulge in it often you should be warned that it can be fatal to your career.
Good government only happens when the people working in it do their jobs, and do them well.
It's not your job to get people to like you, it's your job to like people.
People should wake up in the morning and say 'I am not a job seeker, I am a job-creator.
